CustomField.description: Formula to filter lookup values; Formulas are built with with left as a lookup or junction and right as the object. For example Account__c.City__c = Apttus_Config2__Lineitem__c.City__c, show accounts with cities with the same Line item City.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula to filter lookup values; Formulas are built with with left as a lookup or junction and right as the object. For example Account__c.City__c = Apttus_Config2__Lineitem__c.City__c, show accounts with cities with the same Line item City.
CustomField.label: Filter Criteria
